title: AFK
body: what if your PC turned off and couldn't get back into the game and then u get afk timer

replies.body:
While this seemingly is an issue out of your control (meaning you didn't intend to leave), your AFK/Leave/DC still ruins the gaming experience of up to 9 other players.  Because of this, penalties are levied against your account if this occurs consistently.  However, we understand that random things happen and never punish someone for leaving a single game.

Let me know if you have any other questions!
